    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Admin
    Represents an administrative user with full privileged access in the system.
    AdminHomePage
    AdminHomePage represents the admin interface.
    AdminSetupPage
     
    Announcement
    The Announcement class represents a system-wide announcement.
    Announcement.DisplayType
    Display types for announcements
    Announcement.Priority
    Priority levels for announcements
    AnnouncementPopup
    Announcement Popup with dynamic per-card dismissal (fade out + remove)
    AnnouncementRead
    Tracks which announcements have been read by which users.
    AnnouncementsPage
     
    Answer
    Represents a single answer posted to a question.
    Answers
    The Answers class handles all logic related to managing answers, including creation, editing, deletion, and searching.
    AnswersPage
    AnswersPage UI: shows answers for a question, allows submitting, editing, deleting
    Clarification
     
    ClarificationsManager
     
    DatabaseHelper
    The DatabaseHelper class is responsible for managing the connection to the database, performing operations such as user registration, login validation, and handling invitation codes.
    EditAnswerPage
    The EditAnswerPage class allows users to edit their answers.
    EditQuestionPage
    The EditQuestionPage class allows users to edit their questions.
    EditReviewPage
    The EditReviewPage class allows users to edit their reviews.
    EmailRecognizer
    a finite-state recognizer that validates email address syntax according to defined character and structure rules.
    FAQ
    Model class representing a Frequently Asked Question (FAQ) entry.
    FAQPage
    FAQPage - UI page that displays frequently asked questions grouped by category.
    FirstPage
    FirstPage class represents the initial screen for the first user.
    FollowUpQ
     
    InitialAccessPage
    InitialAccessPage builds and shows the initial access UI used for login, sign-up and password reset flows.
    Instructor
    The Instructor class represents a Instructor entity in the system.
    InstructorHomePage
    The InstructorHomePage class represents the home page for instructors.
    InvitationPage
    InvitePage class represents the page where an admin can generate an invitation code.
    Messages
     
    MessagingPage
     
    MessagingPageLauncher
     
    MyPostsPage
     
    MyQAPage
    The MyQAPage class displays questions created by the logged-in user.
    NavigationBar
     
    PasswordRecognizer
     
    ProfilePage
     
    Question
    Represents a user-posted question with metadata such as author, title, description, timestamp, tags, and resolution status.
    Questions
     
    ResetPasswordPage
     
    Result
     
    Review
    Represents a single review attached to an answer.
    Reviewer
    Represents a reviewer user with permissions to provide feedback and evaluate other users' submissions in the system.
    ReviewPage
    ReviewPage - shows either: - "My Reviews" (show(stage,user)) OR - "Reviews for a selected Answer" (showForAnswer(stage,user,answer))
    Reviews
    In-memory manager for Review objects with backing persistence via DatabaseHelper.
    RoleSelectionPage
    RoleSelectionPage lets users choose which role to act as if they have multiple.
    SearchAsPage
     
    SearchFunction
     
    SearchPage
     
    Staff
    Represents a staff user with permissions to create and manage announcements visible to all users mark or remove questions as FAQs (Frequently Asked Questions) All instances of this class are created with the User.Role.STAFF role.
    StaffAnnouncementPage
    Staff Announcement Management Page Allows staff to create, edit, and delete announcements
    StaffFAQMgmtPage
    A JavaFX page that allows staff to view, edit and remove FAQs.
    StartCSE360
     
    StatusData
    Holds shared application state and configuration for the JavaFX client.
    Student
    Represents a student user with access to questions, answers, and reviews features.
    TrustedReviewersPage
    JavaFX GUI page that allows students to manage and rate their trusted reviewers.
    TrustedReviewersPage.ReviewRow
     
    TrustedReviewersPage.TrustedReviewDisplayRow
     
    TrustedReviewersPage.TrustedReviewerRow
     
    UpdateAccountPage
    UpdateAccountPage class handles the account information update/change process for established users.
    User
    Representes a generic user in the system, encapsulating common attributes such as ID, username, password, role, name, and email.
    User.Role
     
    UserNameRecognizer
     
    UserQAMenu
     
    WelcomeLoginPage
    The WelcomeLoginPage class displays a welcome screen for authenticated users.
